description:
The incredible final battle explodes at Azuchi Castle! With amazing power and determination, Date and Sanada unleash against the mighty Demon Lord.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Azuchi Castle Keep: A Fight to the Death for Tomorrow!
Azuchijou Tenshu Ashita o Kaketa Shitou
安土城天守 明日を懸けた死闘!!
